title: Mesmeric passes, Fascination & ASMR/ Non-verbal hypnotic induction in the forest
description:
Dr. Paret demonstrates strong non-verbal hypnosis in Brazilian's nature. He uses Mesmeric passes, Fascination - the power of the gaze and ASMR sounds. The subject is one of his students from his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass Magnetic Path. She participated to experience and learn the most powerful ancient techniques, that Dr. Paret teaches. After the hypnotic experience she felt much better and happier. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
